revised_title: Joseph Lister: Pioneer of Antiseptic Surgery
tldr: The article is an obituary for Joseph Lister, a prominent surgeon and pioneer of antiseptic surgery. Lister's work focused on understanding inflammation and the changes that occurred in tissues, which led him to develop methods for preventing infection in wounds. His research on inflammation and sepsis earned him a fellowship in the Royal Society, and his contributions to the field of surgery have had a lasting impact on medical history.
